          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Verb i presens - frågor</string>
            <string language="en">Verbs in present tense - questions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verben in der Gegenwart - Fragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verbes au présent - questions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Verbos no tempo atual - perguntas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Verbi nel presente - domande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρήματα στον παρόντα χρόνο - ερωτήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Verbos en el presente - preguntas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på hur man skriver frågor i nutid.Modul 3 - Hur mår du? - Grammatik 3.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we train on how to write questions in the present. Module 3 - How are you? - Grammar 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">nutid</string>
            <string language="sv">verb</string>

            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">questions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier bilden wir auf aus, wie man Fragen in das 
Geschenk schreibt. Modul 3 - Wie geht es Ihnen? - 
Grammatik 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous nous exerçons sur la façon dont écrire
des questions dans le présent. Module 3 - Comment 
allez-vous ? - grammaire 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós treinamos em como escrever perguntas no 
presente. Módulo 3 - Como é você? - gramática 3.
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui addestriamo su come scrivere le domande nel 
presente. Modulo 3 - Come siete? - grammatica 3. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκπαιδεύουμε στο πώς να γράψουμε τις ερωτήσεις 
στο παρόν. Ενότητα 3 - πώς είστε; - Γραμματική 3. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí entrenamos en cómo escribir preguntas en el
presente. Módulo 3 - ¿Cómo es usted? - gramática 
3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
